name: Interdependence(GMTK Game Jam)
description:
WARNİNG: Do not click the quit button if you are playing on website.

You can download the game for better experience.

Play full screen to avoid possible bugs

A  puzzle game with cubes and lasers.

Average  Gameplay time: 6-8 minutes

Controls:

                    Keyboard:

                                              Movement: W/A/S/D Keys

                                               Switch Cubes: Space Bar

                    Gamepad:

                                              Movement: Left Stick

                                               Switch Cubes:  Any button (except trigger buttons)
